input.sentences: there was a lot of rescue workers .

output.sentences: There was on accident on my way to work this morning.
The firemen showed up and got to work on the demolished car.
All the glass from the car was gone, and totalled the car.
The firemen prepared the vehicle to be towed away.
But it was stuck under the rear of the semi.
